predict_diagnosis:
1. Storage disorders (e.g., mucopolysaccharidosis)
2. lysosomal storage disease (e.g., Gaucher's disease)
3. Immunodeficiency syndrome (e.g., Wiskott-Aldrich syndrome)
4. Metabolic disorders (e.g., glycogen storage disease)
5. Autoinflammatory disease (e.g., Cryopyrin-Associated Periodic Syndromes - CAPS)
6. Mitochondrial disease
7. Congenital disorders of glycosylation
8. Hereditary hemorrhagic telangiectasia (Osler-Weber-Rendu syndrome)
9. Ataxia telangiectasia
10. Marfan syndrome (with aortic involvement potentially leading to hepatosplenomegaly)

Please note that these are potential diagnoses based on the symptoms provided, and further clinical evaluation, laboratory testing, and genetic analysis would be necessary to confirm any of these conditions.
